description: Physical asset resources that are required for a process segment shall be presented as physical asset segment specifications
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this physical asset segment specification as the whole

contents.name: specifies
contents.description: The test specification(s) used to evaluate this testable object.

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The physical asset segment specification property(s) of this physical asset segment specification

contents.name: correspondsToPhysicalAssetClass
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the physical asset model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated physical asset class or set of physical asset classes of the specification for a specific process segment

contents.name: correspondsToPhysicalAsset
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the physical asset model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated physical asset or set of physical assets of the specification for a specific process segment. Typically, either physical asset class or physical asset is specified, but not both

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: spatialDefinition
contents.description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

contents.name: physicalLocation
contents.description: Identifies the physical location of the physical asset(s) specified by this physical asset segment specification

contents.name: physicalocationType
contents.description: Indicates whether the physical location attribute refers to an operational location object or contains a description of the physical location. Mandatory where a physical location attribute is specified

enumValues.name: operationalLocation
enumValues.description: physical location attribute references an operational location

enumValues.name: description
enumValues.description: physical location attribute contains a description of the physical location, such as a street address.

contents.name: physicalAssetUse
contents.description: Defines the expected use of the physical asset class or physical asset in the context of the process segment

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: Specifies the amount of resources required

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
